title: Sundaram Finance Q3 net profit dips by 16% at ₹202 cr - Times of India
content: Sundaram Finance Q3 net profit dips by 16% at ₹202 cr  Times of India
description: The Board of Sundaram Finance has declared an interim dividend of Rs 10 per share (100%) for the financial year 2021-22. This will be paid to shareho
